pageTitle: Transport Commissioner Bob Kiley welcomes Crossrail coming one step closer

title.title: Transport Commissioner Bob Kiley welcomes Crossrail coming one step closer

texts: "Today's news that the Government's Crossrail Bill has been published is an important step towards delivering this vital project. Crossrail is needed to deliver the future growth of London, support the creation of hundreds of thousands of new jobs and secure London's position as the world's leading financial centre.
